short_description: pamela glazer is an architects & architectural services company based in shinnecock hills, new york, united states.
long_description: pamela glazer is an award winning architect based in the hamptons, ny. pamela glazer has an innovative approach to architecture that combines elements of both modern and traditional design, and a unique ability to integrate sustainability into her plans. the practice has made exceptional and innovative contributions to housing design throughout the hamptons, including built projects in southampton, east hampton, montauk and sag harbor. the firm designs residential and commercial spaces with dynamic designs that offer a better way of life. her scope of work includes: custom homes, restaurants, offices, retail space, schools, and libraries. glazer offers you a one-to-one approach that is 100% customized. glazer understands the importance of designing a home that allows owners to experience the beauty, light and views of the hamptons both inside and outside the entire space.
generated_description: pamela glazer architect is an award-winning architecture firm based in the hamptons and new york that specializes in residential, commercial, and renovation projects. the firm is led by pamela glazer, an architect with an innovative approach to architecture that combines modern and traditional design elements, and a unique ability to integrate sustainability into her plans. the practice has made exceptional contributions to housing design throughout the hamposons, including built projects in southampton, east hampton, montauk, and sag harbor. their scope of work includes custom homes, restaurants, offices, retail spaces, schools, and libraries. glazer offers a one-to-one approach that is 100% customized and aims to be a partner with clients throughout the design process, from concept to completion. the team also provides services related to zoning requirements, building codes, health department permits, building permits, contractor communication, and associated costs.
